# [Interview #587: TOM Signing Report - Sarayne, Entry #46](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=587#46)

#### Question

I was scared of someone else writing this, but you did a great job!

#### Brandon Sanderson

I was scared myself! Thank you.
